threads.title: 2016/2017 Black screen on MacBook Pros
threads.message: Any ideas on a fix for this issue? I've heard it's a cable which makes sense because it's affected by moving that display back farther, but I'm not seeing anything change with a cable swap. Could it possibly be the cables that are attached directly/permanently to the LCD itself?

threads.message:
